synopsis.text:
Marika Tachibana, Kosaki Onodera, and Chitoge Kirisaki all hold keys to Raku Ichijo's heart, quite literally. As a child, Raku made a secret promise to marry his first love, exchanging a pendant and a key as tokens of their vow. Now, as the heir to the Shuei-Gumi yakuza gang, Raku's life takes a dramatic turn when he's forced to fake a relationship with Chitoge, the daughter of a rival gang leader, to maintain peace between the warring factions.

Amidst the chaos of their false romance, Raku discovers that Chitoge, along with two other girls, possess keys that could potentially unlock his pendant. As these girls enter his life, Raku's search for his childhood sweetheart becomes increasingly complex. With the school festival approaching, Raku and Chitoge must navigate their tumultuous relationship while preparing for a performance of Romeo and Juliet. Will they be able to set aside their differences and make the play a success, or will their feud overshadow the stage? Join Raku in his quest to find his true love and unravel the secrets of the past in this thrilling and heartwarming tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
